Articles.Content: I have been waiting since July when it came out for ps4, however its still not out in Europe. Im starting to worry as nothing is being done about it and ii dont want it to turn to the rock band fiasco which people are still waiting over year.
I can understand your anxiety to start playing KSP. But KSP on console is a mess! You're probably better of NOT playing.

I think it is fair to say that consoles were a bridge too far for Squad. 

For a number of very good reasons, KSP is an excellent PC game and a lousy game for consoles, tablets, phones...

Edited December 3, 2016 by Foxster
